item.title: Basic Scripting With Awk And Gnuplot
item.description: Posted to HN. Comments and discussion highly encouraged. Introduction This will be a short example-based guide to (a) awk (b) gnuplot and (c) using them in a script. I needed to graph some data based on the output of a command run a couple times. So what better way to solve that five minute task than to spend an hour learning awk & gnuplot to automate it?
